title: League ban problems ?
body: I got ban today I got to check email because it told me to check, but when I get into email there no riot mesege.IDK WHAT THE HECK IS HAPPENING, I MY BEING TROLLLED, IS THIS SERIOS, IDK. Riot games can you guys please check my acount to see if I really did something rong because as far as I'm comseren I didn't do anything rong, shore I did leave 1 game because my ms was over 1000 but I didn't get reported and yerstoday I think it was yerstoday I was gave some key fragment for keeping it up sport man ship. RIOT GAME IF I DID SOMETHING RONG IM SORRY. But riot you guys need to know that pple have been sending me a mesege that acts like a RIOT GAME mesege, it says that your acount will be bean after your game, I got troled with this text 3 times. Btw if use gping to ban some one at least give the money back if youre not giving the acount back. I feel like I'm being to gresive with you riot RN but it is the awful truth.

replies.body: am i allowed to slap you with a dictionary? my brother just facepalmed at your post and its his 2nd year learning english.
I'm sorry I'm just really pised by the ban I got btw spanish is my 1 st language I'm learning English

Que tengas mucho suerte en tus estudias de Ingles!

On a serious note, your English is very good, especially because you were probably distressed when writing it. As Ulanopo said, you're fine and the person who said that was being mean :(

>I'm sorry I'm just really pised by the ban I got btw spanish is my 1 st language I'm learning English

Relax. You're doing fine.

Double check your spam folder in email and make sure you dont have any extra folders to partician emails to.  If nothing shows up there is a link at the bottom of this page for support.  I recommend submitting a ticket to see if there is anything they can show you about your ban.  This process can take a while so don't feel discouraged.  (My last ticket took 2 days as it was submitted on a weekend.)
No problem, hope you find out whats going on!

If you log in and the game interface says you're banned and you cannot play the game, then you're banned. If you got a whisper from someone on your friends list, then no, your friend is playing a mean joke on you.

You will get a confirmation email later. It isn't always done at the same time. Sometimes the emails are delayed by a few days.
please copy paste the card you get when you try and log into your account and i can try and direct you.
IM SO SORRY i wrote down rong a lot of thing in that post my 1st language isn't English I'm learning English
